column2: Complete the sentences. Put the verb in the correct form (present simple).
column3: What time {{c1::do the banks close}} (the banks / close)?

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the verb in the correct form (present simple).

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the verb in the correct form (present simple).
column3: Julia {{c1::doesn't drink|does not drink}} (not / drink) tea very often.

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the verb in the correct form (present simple).

column3: How long {{c1::does it take}} (it / take) you to get to work?

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the verb in the correct form (present simple).
